abstract.locale: The 'image' element indicates that the contents of a complete file are to be rendered into a given rectangle within the current user coordinate system.

description.locale: The x-axis coordinate of one corner of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.
The y-axis coordinate of one corner of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.
The width of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.
The height of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.
A URI reference to the image.
